example.captcha
Class CookieImageCaptcha

java.lang.Object
  example.captcha.CookieImageCaptcha
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusteredImageCaptcha
public class CookieImageCaptcha
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusteredImageCaptcha

A cookie based implementation of a clustered image captcha. A generated challenge has a corresponding ciphered cookie containing the answer.

Method Detail

getCaptchaCookie

public javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCaptchaCookie()
                                           throws CipherException
Returns a ciphered cookie containing the answer for this challenge.

Returns:
Cookie the cookie, or null if no challenge has been generated.
Throws:
CipherException - if failed to cipher the cookie value

getCaptchaCookie

public javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCaptchaCookie(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Returns the ciphered cookie from the request.

Parameters:
request - the HTTP request to get the cookie from
Returns:
The ciphered cookie, or null if none exist.
